p: To the Sheriff of Pierce County Greeting:

In the name of the United States of America you are hereby commanded to take the body of Thos. Horn if to be found in this Distrct and him safely keep so that you have been forthwith before the United States District Court for the 2nd Judicial District of Washington Territory was in session at Olympia, in the District aforesaid, then and there to answer to the Territory of Washington in a charge of an assault with intent to kill
Herein fail not, and have you then and there this writ.
Witness the Honorable C.C. Hewitt Chief Justice of Washington Territory and Judge of the 2nd Judicial District this 6 day of September A.D. 1861.
